Reviews.Title: O.K. Camera
Reviews.Author: Recycledbooks77 "Sunshine"
Reviews.Content: The camera is a great camera for the price it is very easy to figure out.  The camera hold's a lot of pictures.  When you take the pictures outside you get somewhat of a clear picture.  I think the camera does not have enough pixels, most of the pictures are o.k.  There is no charger, the batteries go dead very fast, which is expensive. After I had used the camera for about a year the plug on the camera (where you download) the solder wore off.  I can fix that though.  This is a great starter camera

ProductInfo.Features:
5.0 megapixels
4x digital zoom
Accepts SD/SDHC memory cards (32MB internal memory included)
ProductInfo.Name: Philips See Me See YouTM Digital Camera
